channel.title: wind on Simeon Lisovski's personal webpage
channel.description: Recent content in wind on Simeon Lisovski's personal webpage

item.title: ERA5: Download via R
item.description: You can downlaod wind (horizontal) u und (vertical) v vectors on a global scale for different pressure levels (altitudes) from the ERA-5 dataset.

item.title: Animal tracks on the globe with R
item.description: Tutorial (all detailes will follow shortly) I recently submitted a simulation of migrating Bar-tailed godwits (Limosa lapponica) to a vizualisation competition initiated by the BES Movement Ecology SIG.
